description: '''Funkot''' (an abbreviation from '''Funky Kota''') is an electronic dance music genre from Indonesia that emerged in the 1990s. Funkot is a mix of [[House music]] with a tempo of 160 to 220 bpm (beats per minute). Many other names exist for this genre, namely "Hardfunk", "House Kota", "Indonesian House", and "Indonesian Hardcore".
